article_title: VW’s Former CEO Joins Piech’s Electric-Car Startup, Welt Reports
article_text: SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"QHMJUUDWRGG201","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2020-10-03/vw-s-former-ceo-joins-piech-s-electric-car-startup-welt-reports"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-I1OxVBT"}   Matthias Mueller, Volkswagen AG’s former chief executive officer, will join an electric-car company founded by a member of the clan that controls VW, Welt am Sonntag reported.    Mueller will become the supervisory board chairman of Piech Automotive, a Zurich-based carmaker started by Rea Stark and Anton Piech, a son of VW’s former Chairman Ferdinand Piech. The Porsche-Piech clan are the descendants of the designer of the VW Beetle and own the majority of Volkswagen’s common stock.    {"contentId":"QHMJUUDWRGG201","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[1,8]],"small_desktop":[[1,8]],"tablet":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2020-10-03/vw-s-former-ceo-joins-piech-s-electric-car-startup-welt-reports"},"containerId":"outstream-video-1-QHMJUUDWRGG201"}   {"contentId":"QHMJUUDWRGG201","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"mobile":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2020-10-03/vw-s-former-ceo-joins-piech-s-electric-car-startup-welt-reports"},"containerId":"outstream-video-2-QHMJUUDWRGG201"}   “The two founders’ mission was exciting to me because it’s more focused and visionary than all the new approaches that I encountered during my work in the automotive industry,” Mueller said, according to Welt.    {"contentId":"QHMJUUDWRGG201","position":"box","dimensions":{"mobile":[[300,250],[3,3],[1,1],"fluid"]},"type":"Mobile Body Box Ad","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"box1","positionIncrement":1,"url":"/news/articles/2020-10-03/vw-s-former-ceo-joins-piech-s-electric-car-startup-welt-reports"},"containerId":"box-jSllOQK"}   Tesla Inc.’s former European chief, Jochen Rudat, is also joining the company, which counts investor Peter Thiel as one of its early backers.    A funding round aimed at raising 150 million euros ($176 million) is underway, Welt said without identifying the source of the information. The company is developing its first model, a two-seat sportscar, which it plans to start selling in late 2022.   Published on ‎3‎ ‎October‎, ‎2020‎ ‎14‎:‎43        Have a confidential tip for our reporters? GET IN TOUCH    Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal.
